mapper.select: SELECT TSS.sitterNumber sitterNumber, TSS.six six, TSS.seven seven, TSS.eight eight, TSS.nine nine, TSS.ten ten, TSS.oneOne oneOne, TSS.oneTwo oneTwo, TSS.oneThree oneThree, TSS.oneFour oneFour, TSS.oneFive oneFive, TSS.oneSix oneSix, TSS.oneSeven oneSeven, TSS.oneEight oneEight, TSS.oneNine oneNine, TSS.twoZero twoZero, TSS.twoOne twoOne, TSS.twoTwo twoTwo, TSS.twoThree twoThree, TU.userName userName, TU.userId userId, TU.userGender userGender, TU.userDateOfBirth userDateOfBirth, TU.userAddress userAddress, TS.introduce introduce, TS.precautions precautions, TS.totalServiceCnt totalServiceCnt FROM TBL_SITTER_SCHEDULE AS TSS, TBL_USER AS TU, TBL_SITTER AS TS WHERE TS.USERNUMBER=TU.USERNUMBER AND TSS.SITTERNUMBER = #{sitterNumber};
